channel.title: 英语 on 归零幻想
channel.description: Recent content in 英语 on 归零幻想

item.title: 我的理想——我的一篇日记
item.description: 我的理想——我的一篇日记 一不小心翻到了以前初中写的一篇日记，为了装X还是用英文写的，羞耻度爆表…… Wednesday, December 26, 2012 Sunday Today we learned how to talk about future intentions. Iwant to be a programmer when I grow up. So how am I going to do it? I’m goingto study computer science and English when I have free time. It’s veryimportant. I learned Visual Basic. It was made by Microsoft. I can make someprogram now. On my last summer vacation, I made some programs, like notepad.
